DLRU.Label: DLRU
DLRU.Hint: A spritesheet that animates in the order Down, Left, Right, Up.

DURLReduced.Label: DURL Reduced
DURLReduced.Hint: A spritesheet that animates in the order Down, Up, Right, Left, but duplicates the first frame in each row.

Eight.Label: 8-Directional
Eight.Hint: A spritesheet that has all four orthogonal directions and all four diagonal directions.

Diagonal.Label: Diagonal
Diagonal.Hint: A spritesheet that has all four diagonal directions.

Nihey.Label: Nihey
Nihey.Hint: A spritesheet generated by Nihey's Retro Sprite Creator.

UniversalLPC.Label: Universal LPC
UniversalLPC.Hint: A spritesheet generated by the Universal LPC.

Memao.Label: Memao
Memao.Hint: A spritesheet generated by Sleeping Robot's Memao Sprite Creator.
